filterconditions.9: AND ((tags->'usage'='main') OR (tags->'usage'='branch') OR (tags->'railway'='disused') OR (tags->'railway'='abandoned') OR (tags->'railway'='proposed') OR (tags->'railway'='construction') OR (tags->'railway'='station') OR (tags->'railway'='narrow_gauge'))
filterconditions.10: AND ((tags->'railway'='rail') OR (tags->'railway'='disused') OR (tags->'railway'='abandoned') OR (tags->'railway'='proposed') OR (tags->'railway'='construction') OR (tags->'railway'='light_rail') OR (tags->'railway'='tram') OR (tags->'railway'='subway') OR (tags->'railway'='narrow_gauge') OR (tags->'railway'='station') OR (tags->'railway'='halt'))
